attributes.action: provide free leisure centre access to under 18's and long-term unemployed in deprived areas
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We wish to petition the government to provide free leisure centre access to under 18's and the long-term unemployed in deprived areas to help target obesity and general poor health. There is a serious lack of leisure activities in many areas of the UK, providing these facilities would help to reduce obesity figures and give long-term unemployed people an active lifestyle and confidence boost as a result of improved fitness.
